title: TPACK-Based Blended Software Testing Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational programming and mathematical logical thinking skills
context.additional_context: A practical curriculum combining the TPACK framework and project-based learning to overcome the limitations of traditional theory-centered education. It establishes testing strategies through personal device utilization in a BYOD environment and mathematical modeling.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the application of software testing principles (boundary value analysis, equivalence partitioning, etc.) to mathematical models
Learners can design and execute test cases for real-world projects using technological elements (test automation tools) of the TPACK framework
In blended learning environments, learners can identify and improve over 80% of defects in testing projects through peer assessment and feedback systems

resources: JUnit/TestNG and Other Test Automation Tool Licenses

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
